title: Aero, engine, or driver: What will define F1's 2026 revolution?
summary: The 2026 Formula 1 season's radical overhaul will reveal whether aero, engine, or driver skill holds the key to the championship's future

qa_pairs.question: What major changes are expected in the Formula 1 2026 season?
